name: Micro Mouse Goes Debugging
description:
Micro Mouse Goes Debugging is a horror game about debugging a arcade game named Micro Mouse. Your goal is to find all 7 bugs and fix them.

Micro Mouse Goes Debugging is a made for pizza jam 3 in 48 hours using game maker studio.

-SPOILERS-

Enemies:

  • Shadow: Follows the movement of the player.
  • Dead Mouse: At first, it looks like he moves slow, but when you are fixing a bug he will sprint up at you.
  • Debug Bug: The more you use debug mode the faster he becomes. 
    Always starts in the top left corner.
  • Cat: Moves at random between rooms and only moves through the center. Always starts in the bottom right corner.
